name: CONSORTIUM
blurb: A new breed of role playing game that obliterates the fourth wall! (WINDOWS)

rewards.reward: No Reward

EARLY BIRD  "GIMME THE GAME"
==============================

     Get everything from the $15 tier.

OTHER PLATFORMS ============================== Receive the iDGi Discoveries Document (digital) upon game launch + one copy of the game on a platform other than PC, once a port has been made and is available. The Discoveries document is the perfect thing to read before even playing the game! Note: ALL tiers at $17 and above will receive the PC game upon launch & have access to one other copy of the game, on a different platform, when available (delivery date on this is for the iDGi Discoveries document only)
"GIMME THE GAME"   ALL DIGITAL\r\n============================== \r\nDigital copy of the game +  Name included in the game credits  +  Two ring tones from the official soundtrack

*KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE* SPECIAL EDITION (PC only) ============================== Digital Game Manual + Custom main menu content with exclusive credits, behind the scenes video, photos and more. The game itself will be identical to the game you get in lower tiers - ONLY the main menu is changed. Much of the same behind-the-scene content will also be found on the Special Edition DVD (see our Add-Ons). This version of CONSORTIUM will never be available outside of Kickstarter. NOTE: All higher tiers will also receive this version of the game.
BETA + FORUM ACCESS ============================== \r\n\r\nALL OF THE ABOVE + Exclusive access to the closed CONSORTIUM Beta test starting in APRIL 2013 and associated Community Discussion Forum

EARLY BIRD "CONSORTIUM ROOK" 
==============================
        
     Get everything from the $35 tier.

"CONSORTIUM ROOK"  ALL DIGITAL\r\n==============================\r\nALL OF THE ABOVE +  Digital copy of the CONSORTIUM soundtrack by Jeremy Soule + An HD wallpaper of the ZENLIL: C-3800-D command vessel.

"CONSORTIUM KNIGHT"  ALL DIGITAL\r\n==============================\r\nALL OF THE ABOVE +   Two additional copies of the game - give to your friends!  +   A PDF edition of the "iDGi-1 Discoveries" document, signed by the iDGi team (a complete compilation of everything discovered so far from the alternate universe) +   Digital images of the T-Shirt artwork - make your own!  (for our international backers)   +   CONSORTIUM HD wallpaper "The Spirit of CONSORTIUM". (our main image at the top of the page)

MAKE A NAME FOR YOURSELF ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM KNIGHT" tier + have your full name included in the game lore, discoverable via the in-game information console. NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

MAKE HISTORY ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM KNIGHT" tier + work with the design team to come up with your own alternative history event between the years 1700 and 2042 and we will integrate it into the lore. This can of course include *altered history* from our own past or events you make up in our future up to 2042.   NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

MAKE A COMPANY ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM KNIGHT" tier + work with the design team to create an in-game corporation or company that will be used as a part of the lore and written about in the information console. Make yourself the C.E.O.! NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

MAKE HEADLINES ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM KNIGHT" tier + work with the design team to come up with your own current world news event for the year 2042.  NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

"CONSORTIUM BISHOP"
==============================
ALL OF THE ABOVE +  A backer exclusive CONSORTIUM T-Shirt (choose from the designs on the left)  +  Your name in an esteemed place in the game credits.

IF at least 500 people back this level or higher, it will unlock a physical copy of the CONSORTIUM soundtrack for everyone at this level or higher.  The first 1000 copies will be signed by Jeremy Soule...

MAKE A PERSON  ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM BISHOP" tier + work with the design team to create a character who is part of the lore and written about in the information console. This can be yourself if you want of course, either fictional or perhaps even a "future you!" NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

"CONSORTIUM QUEEN" ============================== ALL OF THE ABOVE + Full color HD poster of "The Spirit of CONSORTIUM" signed by the team. (our main image at the top of the page) + Another backer exclusive CONSORTIUM T-Shirt (choose from the designs on the left)

IMMORTALIZE YOURSELF ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM QUEEN" tier + have your photo converted into Zenlil crew personal portraits. NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

THE INTERACTIVE SCREENPLAY ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM QUEEN" tier + receive the full "CONSORTIUM" Interactive Screenplay, a ~500 page printed book, signed by the team. This is the ENTIRE GAME in written form and has taken nearly four years to develop.

SHAMELESS SELF PROMOTION ============================== Everything from the "THE INTERACTIVE SCREENPLAY" tier + have your full-name spoken out loud in the game by one of the main characters. This means you will become someone a main character speaks about... a notable character from the game world and lore!  NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

"CONSORTIUM KING" \r\n==============================\r\nALL OF THE ABOVE +  A full color HD C-3800-D ZENLIL poster signed by the team +     Hard-bound and fully illustrated copy of "the iDGi-1 Discoveries" book signed by the iDGi team (a complete compilation of everything discovered so far from the alternate universe) +    A limited edition lenticular CONSORTIUM "City" poster, signed by the iDGi team, that changes based on the angle you view it from.

BE A VOICE ACTOR  ==============================Everything from the "CONSORTIUM KING" tier + voice an entire interactive conversation with the player as part of a series of in-game easter eggs. These will not exist unless a pledge is made. (Decent microphone required). NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

ZENLIL MASCOT CAT  ============================== Everything from the "CONSORTIUM KING" tier + design and name the Zenlil feline mascot. Only if this pledge is made will there be a cat in the game. NOTE: This tier is exclusive and will not be available to higher tiers.

"CONSORTIUM GOD"\r\n==============================\r\nALL OF THE ABOVE +:   An all expenses weekend trip to visit the CONSORTIUM development team in Vancouver, B.C Canada + Your name used as the name of a major corporation in the game world +  Your face used as the likeness for a character in the game. +  Any future iDGi games are FREE for you + the complete set of all CONSORTIUM design and story documentation as full-color books.
